comments:

If you have more than 2 user libraries defined in your workspace you hit this NPE trying to create a new JPA project.

Created an attachment (id=74458)
proposed patch - fixes the user libraries sort algorithm
*** Bug 200258 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 200485 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 201584 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
